element.name: fabm
element.label: Framework for Aquatic Biogeochemical Models

element.name: use
element.label: enable FABM

element.name: freshwater_impact
element.label: enable dilution/concentration by precipitation/evaporation

element.name: feedbacks
element.label: feedbacks to physics

element.name: shade
element.label: interior light absorption

element.name: albedo
element.label: surface albedo

element.name: surface_drag
element.label: surface drag

element.name: repair_state
element.label: clip state to minimum/maximum boundaries

element.name: ode_method
element.label: time integration scheme applied to source terms

element.name: split_factor
element.label: number of substeps used for source integration

element.name: w_adv_discr
element.label: vertical advection scheme for settling/rising

option.label: third-order TVD with ULTIMATE QUICKEST limiter

element.name: no_surface
element.label: disable surface processes

element.name: save_inputs
element.label: include additional forcing fields in output

element.name: configuration_method
element.label: configuration file

element.name: gravity
element.label: gravitational acceleration

element.name: rho_0
element.label: reference density

element.name: cp
element.label: specific heat of sea water

element.name: avmolu
element.label: molecular viscosity for momentum

element.name: avmolt
element.label: molecular viscosity for temperature

element.name: avmols
element.label: molecular viscosity for salinity

element.name: method
element.label: method to compute mean buoyancy

element.name: surf_ini
element.label: initial buoyancy at the surface

element.name: NN_ini
element.label: initial value of NN (=buoyancy gradient)

element.name: obs_sbf
element.label: observed constant surface buoyancy flux

element.name: eq_state
element.label: equation of state

element.name: mode
element.label: formula

element.name: method
element.label: implementation

element.name: T0
element.label: reference temperature

element.name: S0
element.label: reference salinity

element.name: p0
element.label: reference pressure

element.name: dtr0
element.label: thermal expansion coefficient

element.name: dsr0
element.label: saline expansion coefficient

element.name: load
element.label: initialize simulation with state stored in restart.nc

element.name: allow_missing_variable
element.label: warn but not abort if a variable is missing from restart file

element.name: output
couette
element.label: path of output file, excluding extension

element.element: <element name="sync_interval" type="integer" label="number of output steps between sychronization to disk (<= 0: sync on close only)"/>
